description: Create a new folder in the Xray Cloud Test Repository under an optional parent path. If no path is provided, the folder is created under the repository root.

name.description: Folder name to create under the parent path.

path.description: Optional parent folder path in the Xray Test Repository (e.g., Regression/Ui/Login, Sanity/Api). If omitted or empty, the folder is created under the root.

project.description: The Jira project key (for example, PROJ).

name: new_xray_test_repository_folder

link.description: Direct URL to open the folder in Jira/Xray (if available).

path.description: Full repository path of the created folder.
